skills.title: Analytics Research Skill
skills.notes: Transforms business questions into data-driven insights through hypothesis testing, metrics validation, and experimental design.

skills.title: Architect Plan Skill
skills.notes: Provides structured architectural guidance through systematic design decisions, risk assessment, and validation planning.

skills.title: Product PRD Skill
skills.notes: Transforms business problems and user needs into structured Product Requirements Documents within Task Packages.

skills.title: Code Review Skill
skills.notes: Provides systematic code review evaluation with severity classifications, risk assessments, and actionable next steps.

skills.title: Code Unit Skill
skills.notes: Validates unit-level code quality through systematic testing, coverage analysis, and component reliability verification.

skills.title: QA Contract Skill
skills.notes: Validates interface compatibility across systems through systematic contract testing and verification.

skills.title: QA End-to-End Skill
skills.notes: Validates end-to-end user journeys and cross-system workflows through comprehensive testing across multiple services.

skills.title: QA Stress Skill
skills.notes: Validates system capacity, resilience, and scalability under load through systematic stress testing and capacity planning.

skills.title: Research Skill
skills.notes: Transforms uncertainty into actionable knowledge through systematic investigation and evidence-based analysis.

skills.title: Context Compact Skill
skills.notes: Maintains task file usability by managing Activity Log growth while preserving audit trail and essential information.

skills.title: Agile Plan Skill
skills.notes: Transforms delivery intentions into structured agile plans with coordinated sprint execution and capacity management.

skills.title: PM Sync Skill
skills.notes: Synchronizes Task Packages with external work trackers, ensuring bidirectional consistency across systems.

agents.title: Product Ops Orchestrator
agents.notes: Source of truth for Task Package stewardship workflows and skill routing.

agents.title: Architect Orchestrator
agents.notes: Architecture-focused collaboration guardrails, decision logging, and validation templates.

agents.title: Tech Lead Orchestrator
agents.notes: Implementation planning, review coordination, and testing oversight playbook.

agents.title: QA Orchestrator
agents.notes: Quality strategy, coverage expectations, evidence logging, and readiness gating.

concepts.notes: Legacy term for single document specs; use Task Packages instead.
Controller that integrates Spec Kit, BMAD, Specmatic, and PM adapters.
Canonical compact context format: `Context, Facts, Decisions, Risks, Next`.
Multi-section artifact storing end-to-end initiative context, decisions, plans, and logs.
Location where detailed historical notes are stored when context is compressed.
Severity shorthand for defects used across QA reporting.
Risk categorization (Red/Amber/Green) applied to findings and readiness.
